CustomField.description: Used to tie a quote line to a specific Account. Use this if you enable the Match QLI Account to SA Account setting to map which sales agreements this quote line will be added to.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to tie a quote line to a specific Account. Use this if you enable the Match QLI Account to SA Account setting to map which sales agreements this quote line will be added to.
CustomField.label: Account ID
